cs.ualberta.conditionlog.model
Class DatabaseAdapter

java.lang.Object
  cs.ualberta.conditionlog.model.DatabaseAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DatabaseDeletionAdapter, DatabaseInputAdapter, DatabaseOutputAdapter
public class DatabaseAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

This class acts as an interface for manipulating the database. After creating a DatabaseAdapter object, call open() on it before using it or you will get Null Pointer Exceptions. Once you are done with the DatabaseAdapter, call close() on it.

Author:
tgriffit

Constructor Summary
DatabaseAdapter(Context context)
          Constructor for the adapter.
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the connection to the database.
 void open()
          Opens a connection to the database using the DatabaseHelper.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

DatabaseAdapter

public DatabaseAdapter(Context context)
Constructor for the adapter. It sets up a DatabaseHelper to maintain the database connection.

Parameters:
context - - the current application context
Method Detail

open

public void open()
Opens a connection to the database using the DatabaseHelper. Must be called before any other DatabaseAdapter methods can be called.

close

public void close()
Closes the connection to the database. Should always be called when you are doing calling DatabaseAdapter methods.
